name: panda-blog-platform
description: Microservices-based blogging platform with panda theme

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:post" "npm run dev:comment" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:user && npm run build:post && npm run build:comment
